title: Hollow of the Unspoken
caption: You arrive at the edge of something that doesn't speak — but listens.

title: The Gate Waits
caption: A passage glows. You are not sure if it leads inward, backward, or through.

title: The Listening Stone
caption: A markless stone observes you in stillness. It will not speak first.

title: The Mirror Moon
caption: The cracked moon reflects from a polished surface — a silent, wounded light.

title: A Message Appears
caption: *What was buried in silence grows in light.* Who wrote this? Was it meant for you?

title: The Glyphs Remember
caption: Shapes you’ve seen before — now pulsing. Some are warnings. Some are keys.

title: The Seal Unwinds
caption: A triad of runes protects the vault. But the center spiral pulses — unlocked.

title: Descent
caption: The door opens. The chamber does not welcome. It remembers.

title: The Light Beneath
caption: What you feared is not gone — only waiting. Nova’s presence flickers faintly.
